description: this is a stand-offer of aviation fuel in line within the aviation industry standard
full_summary:
================================
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Into-Plane Aviation Fuel

**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Solicitation Number:** WS3824587166
**Publication Date:** January 12, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** January 23, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST)

**Tender Status:** Cancelled

**Description:** The Department of Public Works and Government Services is seeking proposals for National Master Standing Offers for aviation fuels (Into-Plane) in accordance with Canadian General Standards Board standards.

**Delivery Location:** Various locations in Canada

**Quantity:** Various quantities as required

**Notice URL:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15116993?extsite=MTUxMTY5OTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15116993?extsite=MTUxMTY5OTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Contact Information:**
Bobbi MacLeod (SPAC/PSPC)
bobbi.macleod@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Amendment Information
This tender announcement has undergone an amendment, which changes the closing time for bid submission from 2:00 PM EST to 2:00 PM EST. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on January 23, 2023, by 2:00 PM EST. Any bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST will be declared non-responsive.

### Trade Agreements
This tender announcement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
